name: Caved Love
description:
You enter a dark cave without a light, what could possibly happen? Will you meet a handsome ghost and become lovers, or will he do something that's not so great? Who knows haha…

Caved Love is a very short visual novel/comic made for NaNoRenO 2022

CONTENT WARNING -

There is some bright imagery (but not flashing lights), there is also a shirtless guy basically the whole time so yeah :)

There are 3 endings for this comic and they will be based on your first few choices. The playtime is around 3-6 mins. Yes I know, very short ｡ﾟ･（>﹏<）･ﾟ｡

This comic is so short because this is my first time making one and I did not have much time because of school, unfortunately.  Also since I made this on my own and it's my first novel, I'm still trying to figure out how to create stories and there may be some glitches but hopefully not lol. Nonetheless, I still hope you guys enjoy playing and reading this short story I made! 

All art and story made by me, KenadiDraws.
